title: Sun trine Mars
summary: A supportive alignment between intention and action. Motivation flows with less resistance, making it easier to act decisively and productively. The opportunity is to use momentum intentionally rather than waste it.

meaning.headline: Effort supports direction.

frames.text: Sun–Mars trines align purpose with energy, supporting confident and effective action.
This aspect favors initiative that feels both timely and sustainable.
Momentum increases when actions reflect clear intent.
Physical or practical tasks tend to move more smoothly.
This guarantees success or effortless outcomes.

frictions: Assuming momentum will last without maintenance
Skipping reflection in favor of speed
opportunities: Making tangible progress on active projects

do: Act on priorities that benefit from momentum.
Choose tasks that require initiative and follow-through.
avoid: Taking on more than you can sustain
Rushing past planning because things feel smooth
Ignoring limits while energy is high

reusable_lines.text: Momentum works best when it serves clear intent.
Effective action feels focused, not forced.

allowed_framing: Contextual framing: 'if energy and clarity align…'

sources: Sun–Mars trine as will/action harmony archetype
